General.Name: Country Group Development Public Company Limited
General.Description: Country Group Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development business in Thailand and internationally. It also trades, rents, and operates real estate properties; and provides construction and building maintenance services, as well as engages in construction and wholesale of equipment and furniture used in construction. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
